mapper.insert: INSERT INTO quest (type, category, title, difficulty, xp, is_seasonal, season_start, season_end, status, created_at) VALUES (#{type}, #{category}, #{title}, #{difficulty}, #{xp}, #{is_seasonal}, #{season_start}, #{season_end}, #{status}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE quest SET type = #{type}, category = #{category}, title = #{title}, difficulty = #{difficulty}, xp = #{xp}, is_seasonal = #{isSeasonal}, season_start = #{seasonStart}, season_end = #{seasonEnd}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{quest_id}
